message.content:
1. OFC showed significant improvement.
2. The improvement of OFC was measured against a placebo.
3. The measurement of improvement was based on the CDRS-R total score.
4. OFC showed significant improvement on the CDRS-R total score.
5. The measurement of improvement was also based on 7 of the 17 CDRS-R items.
6. OFC showed significant improvement on 7 of the 17 CDRS-R items.
7. The level of significance for the improvement was p ≤ 0.05.

messages.content:
Statement: OFC showed significant improvement (p ≤ 0.05) versus placebo on the CDRS-R total score and on 7 of the 17 CDRS-R items.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
